sources.title: Operation Repo: The Movie | Full Action Comedy Movie
sources.description:
When a team of re-possessors find them selves in a wild scenario where the owner of the repossession company's daughter gets kidnapped by a drug dealer and is holding her ransom for a car that they were using to deliver an unknown very expensive item, it also turns out there are other bad guys looking to hijack this car. Lou and his band if misfits want to get his daughter back without getting the police involved little do they know the cops are watching all along and the FBI is ready to take down the bad guys.
2009.  Stars: Patricia Ayame Thomson, Lou Pizarro, Alen Toric

metadata.Plot: In a feature film based off the popular TruTV series, the team must scramble against time to save Lu's daughter Lyndah from a gang of dangerous criminals.
metadata.Actors: Lou Pizarro, Cody Cowell, Alex Noble
